Every day starts with some Expectations, and every day ends with some Experience. This is Life, so enjoy every day. Thanks!
The greatest inspiration you can ever get is to know that you are an inspiration to others. Wake up and start living an inspirational Life today. Thanks!
To be happy, look for things to appreciate, no matter what is happening around you.
Give the best of you everywhere you go. Give a smile, give thanks, give kindness, give love & give without expectation of return.
Your destiny is in Your hands. Whatever you think and feel will decide your life. Always think positive.
When the voice on the inside becomes clearer and louder than the opinions on the outside, you`ve mastered your life.
The life of your dreams starts with one powerful thought, and then another, and another.

NIIT: Massachusetts Institute Of Technology acquired 30 lakh shares (2.12%) at Rs 96.75 per share. Massachusetts Institute of Technology already has 1.87% stake in the company as on June 30. Thus its holdings has increased to 3.99%.
Apollo Tyres: Board approved issue of NCDs worth Rs 1,000 crore. To issue convertible preference shares up to Rs 540 crore to Emerald Sage Investment.
VIP Industries: Board approved issue of NCDs worth Rs 50 crore on a private placement basis.
Bharti Airtel: Bloomberg News reports that Telecom Kenya has opted out of the company`s proposed network merger.
Inox Leisure: Board approves the enabling resolution for fund raising up to Rs 250 crore through the issuance of equity shares / other methods.

HDFC: Launches QIP issue at a floor price of Rs 1,838.94 per share. The floor price is a 4% premium to Wednesday`s closing. The company intends to raise Rs 14,000 crore through issue of equity and Rs 9,000 crore through NCDs. The board will...
